articles.author: HT Entertainment Desk
articles.title: Anupam Kher reports burglary at Mumbai office, film negative and cash stolen - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Actor Anupam Kher took to his Twitter account and shared an update that his Mumbai office has been burgled and he has filed an FIR.
articles.content: Actor Anupam Kher reported burglary at his Mumbai office. He took to his Twitter account on Thursday to share an update that thieves entered his Veera Desai home and stole a safe full of cash and negatives.

articles.author: Lauren Taylor, Evan Hummel, Jake Maslo
articles.title: NASA astronauts stuck at ISS as issues with Boeing Starliner delay return - Straight Arrow News
articles.description: Two astronauts will have to wait to return back to Earth for longer than expected as issues with the Boeing Starliner vehicle are addressed.
articles.content: Boeing is delaying the return of two NASA astronauts from the International Space Station (ISS), following problems with helium leaks and thrusters.

articles.author: BS Tech
articles.title: Tech wrap Jun 20: Realme GT 6 pre-orders, Motorola Razr series launch, more - Business Standard
articles.description: Tech News Today: Realme GT 6 goes on pre-order in India soon after the global launch on June 20. Motorola schedules Razr series launch for June 25. OnePlus introduces Glacier Battery technology for smartphones.
articles.content: Realme GT 6 goes on pre-order in India soon after the global launch on June 20. Motorola schedules Razr series launch for June 25. OnePlus introduces Glacier Battery technology for smartphones.

articles.author: HT News Desk
articles.title: Modi Kashmir Visit LIVE: ‘We will not hesitate to…,’ PM on J&K terror attacks - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Narendra Modi Kashmir visit LIVE: PM Modi is set to commence his two-day visit to Jammu and Kashmir on Thursday, June 20.
articles.content: Narendra Modi Kashmir Visit Live: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Thursday commenced his two-day visit to Jammu and Kashmir. He is visiting the union territory on June 20 and 21, to launch development projects and address security issues.

articles.author: GK Web Desk
articles.title: 6 Srinagar pilgrims among 10 die due to heatwave during Hajj - Greater Kashmir
articles.description: Pilgrims from Kulgam include Hafeeza Bano of Kharbrari Yaripora; and Muneera Banoo of Hambatan Pora Okey Kulgam.
articles.content: Srinagar, June 20: Ten pilgrims from J&K including six from Srinagar district have died due to the heatwave while performing Hajj.

articles.author: TOI Entertainment Desk
articles.title: Shatrughan Sinha's THIS pic went viral amid Sonakshi Sinha wedding celebrations - TOI Etimes
articles.description: Amid preparations for his daughter Sonakshi Sinha’s wedding to longtime boyfriend Zaheer Iqbal, Shatrughan Sinha was seen posing with Sonakshi’s 'mama'.

articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Sachin Tendulkar, Gautam Gambhir condole tragic death of ex-India pacer David Johnson: 'He was full of life' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Ex-India star David Johnson was found dead outside his apartment. Sachin Tendulkar and Gautam Gambhir have expressed deep sadness over the tragic death.
articles.content: Members of the Indian cricket fraternity, including Master Blaster Sachin Tendulkar and former India opener Gautam Gambhir, have expressed deep sadness and shock over the tragic passing away of former India pacer David Johnson.
